content.description: This is the chasm to the south of the overlook when you first hit the shoreline from the trail that goes through the woods from the parking lot. You can enter in the bottom at low tide or lower in at high tide.
content.protection: TR anchors can be found here but are extremely rusty. You're better off using gear and/or slings. If you do use the bolts, make sure you back them up with gear.
content.location: It is south from the overlook at the end of the trail.

content.description: This is a good spot to head to on really hot days. A good sea breeze and full sun all day can be found here. There are several good boulders and a long, deep, wide split in the rock which can be top roped.
